channel.title: Help with error
channel.description:
client.java:21135: illegal start of expression if(wearID == && playerRights != 3) ^ client.java:21141: illegal start of expression if(wearID == && playerRights != 3) ^ client.java:21147: illegal start of expression if(wearID == && playerRights != 2) ^ client.java:21153: illegal start of expression if(wearID == && playerRights != 1) ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .
i got that error trying to make a item mod admin and owner only.. any help?

item.title: Help with error
item.dc:creator: @aplwanabes aplwanabes
item.description:
@aplwanabes wrote:

Thanks! i got no errors

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

}
if(wearID == XXXX && playerRights < 2){
sM(“You must be a owner to wear this.”);
return false;
}

}
if(wearID == XXXX && playerRights < 1){
sM(“You must be a Admin to wear this.”);
return false;
}

}
if(wearID == XXXX && playerRights < 0){
sM(“You must be a Mod to wear this.”);
return false;
}

You can try this code just replace the XXXX with the item id and if you dont have the rights for it it will not wear it and send a message.
if you get any errors post them here and i or some one else can help

Read full topic
